title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1453/85 of 31 May 1985 fixing for the 1985 marketing year the Community offer price for lemons applicable with regard to Greece
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1453/85
of 31 May 1985
fixing for the 1985 marketing year the Community offer price for lemons applicable with regard to Greece
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1985 marketing year, the Community offer price for fresh lemons falling within subheading 08.02 C of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net, is hereby fixed as follows, for products of quality category I, graded according to size and packed:
June: 37,36
July and August: 41,82
September: 37,90
October: 33,25
November and December: 30,05

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
